column4: well, it's not making an iso, it's dumping out whatever's in the .bin file
it's extracting whatever is in the .bin file
can't you ask your "friend" what's in it?
distrowatch numbers are completely meaningless, tho
that means you need to run apt as root
or it crashed at some point in the past
or that you have two copies running
using python means you'll never get it on a floppy
there's a few people (mainly colin, iirc) working on using gtkfb
I didn't know it was still available on a floppy :) Though even gtkfb on a floppy seems tough
